metadata.title: Piero Perilli | VFX Artist & Video Post Production Rome, Italy | Visual Effects, Motion Graphics, AI
metadata.description: VFX, motion graphics, color grading and video post-production in Rome, Italy. Piero Perilli: digital craftsman with 20+ years of experience for cinema, advertising and brands.

hero.headline: 20 years of visual craftsmanship.
hero.subtitle: VFX, motion graphics, color grading and post-production. One single point of contact from concept to final master.

pillars.pillar1Text: 20+ years of professional post-production. Films, commercials, top-tier brands. The precision of a watchmaker, applied to pixels.
pillars.pillar2Text: VFX, motion graphics, color grading and editing in one seamless flow. No handoffs, no middlemen. Less time, more creative consistency.
pillars.pillar3Text: Artificial intelligence doesn't replace 20 years of trained eyes. It multiplies them. AI tools integrated into a professional workflow with the mastery of someone who knows what works.

services.vfxText: Compositing, green screen, set extension, tracking, clean-up. For cinema, advertising and digital.
services.motionText: Animations for brands, campaigns, titles. From concept to final animation.
services.animation3dText: Product 3D, character animation, environments. From briefing to final render.
services.postText: Editing, color grading, finishing. Certified DaVinci Resolve workflow.
services.aiText: AI-generated video, hybrid AI + traditional workflow. Experience guides the technology.

ctaSection.text: Tell me what you're looking for. First discovery call is free, no strings attached.

footer.tagline: Digital craftsman. VFX, motion graphics, post-production and AI.
